price: ߞߋ߲ߛߐ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߝߊ߲߭ ߠߎ߬ ߘߐ߫، ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߛߋߦߌ߲߫ ߠߋ߬ ߦߴߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߛߍ߬ߡߍ ߕߊ߬ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ߘߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߏ߲
arabic: وَٱلۡمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرۡجَآئِهَاۚ وَيَحۡمِلُ عَرۡشَ رَبِّكَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ ثَمَٰنِيَةٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wal-malaku ʿalā arjāihā wayaḥmilu ʿarsha rabbika fawqahum yawma-idhin thamāniyatun
